content.text:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer

message.content: DESCRIPTION: The image shows a room with two single beds. The bed on the left has a bright red comforter and white pillows. The bed on the right has a red comforter as well, but is partially obscured. Above the beds on the wall are two framed pictures – one featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse in a playful pose, and the other featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse with hearts. Between the beds is a white nightstand with a lamp, a doll, and a stuffed bunny and bear.

content.text:
You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows a room with two single beds. The bed on the left has a bright red comforter and white pillows. The bed on the right has a red comforter as well, but is partially obscured. Above the beds on the wall are two framed pictures – one featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse in a playful pose, and the other featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse with hearts. Between the beds is a white nightstand with a lamp, a doll, and a stuffed bunny and bear.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['south', 'east']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}

message.content: QUESTION: Are there any beds visible in the image? If so, how many and what color are the comforters?

message.content: QUESTION: Are there any pictures hanging above the beds, and if so, what do they depict? Also, is there a nightstand between the beds with a lamp, doll, and stuffed animals?

content.text: question: are there any pictures hanging above the beds, and if so, what do they depict? also, is there a nightstand between the beds with a lamp, doll, and stuffed animals?

message.content:
ANSWER: Yes, there are two pictures hanging above the beds. One depicts Mickey and Minnie Mouse in a playful pose, and the other depicts Mickey and Minnie Mouse with hearts. 

Yes, there is a white nightstand between the beds with a lamp, a doll, a stuffed bunny, and a stuffed bear on it.
